channel.title: MoparIsTheBest - How to change Member Title
channel.description:
I have recently and in the past noticed that Ron and The Un-Named have changed their member title. I was wondering how they did it because i wan't to change mine to. Now they both have a member title saying: "is a...". I was wondering how to make one like that.
For Example: [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/1881/theunnamedlf3.png[/img] Like in the above picture, how do you add the box in red part?
Thanks for your help and assistance, Dudeofthed.

item.title: MoparIsTheBest - How to change Member Title
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:6, topic:74706”][quote author=dudeofthed link=topic=109697.msg1095426#msg1095426 date=1175791222]

They did it because they are Global Moderators, only them and admins have the power to change it, sorry.

Oh, that makes me sad.

But, then why is there a personal text section in the profile changer? What is that used for?
[/quote]

Your profile. Click my profile and you should see “Hehehe.” under my picture, that’s my personal text.[/quote]

Oh, ok. Thanks The Un-Named.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparIsTheBest - How to change Member Title
